task.title: Preview a Plot
task.shortdesc: Viewing a drawing before printing gives you a preview of what your drawing will look like when it is printed. This helps you see if there are any changes you want to make before actually printing the drawing. If you are using print style tables, the preview shows how your drawing will print with the assigned print styles.

context.p: The systemautomatically generates preview results as soon as you setup relevant plotting properties.
To preview a drawing before printing

step.cmd: If necessary, click the desired Layout tabor the Model tab.
Choose File > Plot Preview from the main menu.
To print the drawing, click Plot in the top left corner.
To return to the drawing, click the Close Preview Window buttonor press Esc.
